name: synchrix
description: Synchrix is a modern real-time chat application built with the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js) and powered by Socket.IO for fast and scalable communication. It supports seamless one-to-one messaging, dynamic group chats, and advanced group management (create, update, delete groups, add/remove members, assign/revoke admin roles). Synchrix also features instant online/offline presence updates, real-time message editing and deletion, and smooth synchronization across all devicesâ€”keeping every conversation perfectly in sync.
author: Usman Hameed
